channel.title: Which redash version support 'Skip TLS verification'
channel.description:
### Issue Summary
A summary of the issue and the browser/OS environment in which it occurs.
### Technical details:
![CleanShot 2022-10-21 at 18.51.45@2x|269x300](upload://hisqMRybUBoySOPM0OIH0tnoail.jpeg)
* Redash Version: Version: 10.1.0 (2589bef1) * Browser/OS: MacOS m1 * How did you install Redash: self host docker
